item.title: Minor" Problems help plz
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

public void highscores() {
clearQuestInterface();
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { { <------- erase one of these...
sendQuest("@dre@", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@blu@ ====Highscores====", 8145);
sendQuest("@bla@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+ " @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ " +server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[24], 8147+i);
}
}
}

Now that wasn’t so hard was it? Maybe next time you could even do it yourself!

By the way, I’m not snapping at you, lol.
I mean that sarcastically in an enthusiastic way.
